programme.desc: ...With William Shatner. Monsters: A fisherman uncovers the remains of an unidentified sea creature on a beach, and a hairy creature causes panic in New Delhi. (S2, ep 3)

programme.desc: Mutant Mummy & Alien Monolith: A small human-like creature makes loud movements in New Jersey, while monoliths pop up all over the world as the team comb through more evidence. (S2, ep 14)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Remote Viewing: A look at the CIA's rumoured investment in psychological operations. Could there be an army of remote viewers watching American citizens today? (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Fake World Leaders: Are Hitler, Saddam Hussein and Osama Bin Laden really dead? Experts find proof that several infamous world leaders didn't die when you think they did. (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: America's Alien Wars: Startling evidence suggests the US military has been under attack from aliens for 50 years. Could they be keeping such a huge secret from the public? (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: Conspiracy Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Time Travel: Could the ability to travel through time be real? Experts unseal new evidence suggesting this phenomenon of science fiction might not be as far-fetched as it seems. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Seth's Big Bet: Ashley challenges Seth to a unique competition in the pawn shop. Should he lose, the world will hear the one thing he's been fighting to keep a secret. (S7, ep 11)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Oh No He Didn't: Les loses his temper when the kids suggest he sells their failing second store. With the family's livelihood at stake, Seth puts a sneaky plan into action. (S7, ep 12)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Oh Yes He Did: Ashley is pulled into the fray as Seth's plan to sell the Pontiac shop hits a snag. Then a meeting with a buyer leaves them in a life-changing situation. (S7, ep 13)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Family Matters: Finding it hard to forgive Seth for trying to sell his business, Les locks himself in his office. Meanwhile, a fight breaks out on the pawn shop floor. (S8, ep 1)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Pay to Play: Les is caught in a dilemma over the authenticity of a rare guitar. With no expert on hand, he's forced to go with his gut. (S8, ep 2)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Unforgiven: Rich makes a glaring error that could see him fired. Plus, a kooky cowboy arrives at the counter and Ashley reacts to bad manners in the pawn shop queue. (S8, ep 3)

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: Dead Aim: Ton and Allen face-off against a shady buyer. The guys find a custom-built monowheel and a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century. (S3, ep 18)

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: Allen's Got Balls: After returning to LA, Ton and Allen butt heads with a familiar old foe. They also discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle. (S3, ep 17)

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: Bowling Pin Payday: Allen and Ton go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They find a 19th century rifle and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the 1960s. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: The Jersey Score: Ton and Allen are made to feel unwelcome at a silent auction in New Jersey. They uncover a vintage vehicle and a skeet throwing machine from the 1960s. (S3, ep 15)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole,Allen Millyard and Guy Willison visit top collector Stuart Imber before preparing to sell their latest finds at the Fairford Steam. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry, Allen and Guy explore a bike specialist's sheds, take a £1200 gamble, and head to an auto jumble. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: Alien Corridors
programme.desc: Alaska: A powerful earthquake in 2018 seemed to lead to an increase in UFO sightings in Alaska - but why? Do the extra terrestrials have something to protect here? (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Alien Corridors
programme.desc: Sedona: With all the activity that's been recorded here, Sedona seemingly doubles as an intergalactic airport - but what is drawing UFOs to this spot? (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: Ancient UFOs: From the lore and history of ancient Egypt to the myths of Native Americans, mankind's past is riddled with the evidence of UFOs. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: Deathbed Confessions: Many believe that extraterrestrial secrets are not just limited to the military - so could deathbed confessions provide evidence of the existence of UFOs? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Cities Of The Underworld
programme.desc: Real Mafia Underground Sicily: Presenter Don Wildman uncovers the underworld of Sicily, tracing the network of ancient subterranean waterways used by the Mafia. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: Cities Of The Underworld

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Hampshire: Babbling Sean Kelly is the auction host with the most on the south coast, where an uplifting prize gets the offers rolling. John gives Nat flak for blind bidding.

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Carmarthen: Auction anarchy in Wales, where the bidders hope to get rich quick by bagging valuable storage lots. It's cloak-and-dagger stuff as spying equipment is on offer.

programme.title: Train Truckers
programme.desc: Deltic 9009: A legendary diesel locomotive, that's undergone over half a million pounds worth of repairs must be hauled over 40 miles ready for a diesel gala.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy reports on the Porsche GT3 RS and Ferrari 360 Challenge Stradale, Richard searches for a Dodge Charger, and model and singer Jordan is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: What's faster: a Ford Ka or a pigeon? James May provides the answer as Jezza tries to drive from London to Edinburgh and back in an Audi A8 on just one tank of fuel.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick forages for mussels in his favourite rock pools, tours Bodmin Moor's dark past with his son Jack, and cooks a foolproof souffle with artisanal Cornish goat's cheese.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick makes heritage cider with author Raynor Winn, cooks a chicken, leek and cider gratin for his old friend John Harris, and meets a sea shanty group with a difference.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Francophile: The Bikers continue their culinary journey by looking across the Channel to see how the French have influenced the way we cook and eat over time.

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Cunning celebs attempt to tell fact from fiction. Rob Brydon welcomes regulars David Mitchell and Lee Mack plus Mackenzie Crook, Chris Packham, Victoria Coren and Rhod Gilbert.

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
programme.desc: Retired footballer David James, comedians Rhys James and Isy Suttie, and athletics legend Denise Lewis tackle the best-selling author's fun-filled brainteasers in this edition.

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
programme.desc: More mind-bending puzzles and fun with the ever-genial Pointless personality - he's joined this time by Sara Barron, Anton Du Beke, Jessica Fostekew and Rickie Haywood-Williams.

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.desc: Comedian and actress Jo Brand takes over the reins for an extended edition of the quiz, with politician Heidi Allen and stand-up Phil Wang joining Ian Hislop and Paul Merton.

programme.title: Dave Gorman: Modern Life Is Goodish

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Cold War Rivals Part 2. One of the deadliest jobs in the world is that of the Alaskan crab fisherman. They brave the treacherous waves of the Bering Sea in search of valuable king crabs. S16, Ep2

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Typhoon Hagibis. As the fleet begins its race against the Russians, ferocious typhoon Hagibis hits the Bering Sea. Captains must choose whether to risk their lives for a big payday. S16, Ep2

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: A New Cabin Legacy. Chase and his team face cold and slippery winter conditions to convert a 30-year-old gambrel garage into a family's functional living space. S7, Ep1

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Alarmed & Dangerous. With hope of redeeming themselves after their disastrous first hauling job, the four eldest Brown brothers prepare for a second solo mission. S3, Ep6

programme.title: Yukon Men

programme.title: Yukon Men
programme.desc: The Edge. The reality of the 'dark winter days' takes hold. Chris and Jessi struggle for each meal and need a new strategy. For Pat, it's time to find out if his gamble will pay off. S5, Ep7

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: Raney Days Are A-Comin'. With only two weeks left to finish their ambitious self-rescue, Marty races to complete the log cabin. Plus, Matt takes the next generation on gold hunt. S1, Ep3

programme.title: Homestead Rescue: Raney Ranch
programme.desc: Do Or Die. Marty struggles to finish the cliff-top cabin in time. Plus, the family must risk another river crossing to get materials across for a final crucial build. S1, Ep4

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Bushmen Rod and Les risk their lives reopening a long-abandoned mine. New team the Young Guns go deep underground for the first time, hunting pineapple opal. S3, Ep2

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters

programme.title: Deadliest Catch

programme.desc: The Staircase Implementation: Leonard tells Penny about how he and Sheldon became friends, and the origins of the roommate agreement.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Lunar Excitation: Raj registers Sheldon for online dating and finds the perfect match: the female version of Sheldon. Penny seduces Leonard while she's drunk.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Wad Goals: Bart becomes a successful caddy but Marge worries that it's ruining his character.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Sicko: Peralta and Boyle investigate a serial killer. Holt spars with his rival, Commissioner Kelly. Jeffords deals with complications after his recent exam.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Suicide Squad: Desperate circumstances call for desperate measures as Peralta, Captain Holt and the team are forced to ally themselves with some old enemies.

programme.title: Celebs Go Dating
programme.desc: Brand new series: As the celebs make a splash at the pool party, Liv confronts Louis. The boys head out on a triple date. And Made in Chelsea's Sam Prince joins the agency.

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: Brand new series - Out, Damned Spot: Captain Glenn doesn't let anyone off the hook when the crew get a bit rowdy during their night off. And a familiar face rejoins the crew...

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Summer Sausage, a Pocket Poncho, and Tony Danza: Sheldon is busy obsessing over the status of Meemaw's budding relationship with his mentor, Dr John Sturgis.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Vanilla Ice Cream, Gentlemen Callers, and a Dinette Set: When Meemaw is pursued by two gentlemen callers and decides to date them both, Sheldon interferes.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Day Alex Left for College: Phil and Claire feel snubbed when Alex gives them the wrong college move-in date to avoid them making it a big deal.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: I Lost on Jeopardy!: Erica applies to be on TV quiz show Jeopardy! A new crush makes Barry realise that he might not be quite over Lainey yet.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes is overcome with emotion as her family hold a vigil for Bobby. Dillon extends an olive branch to an unexpected resident. And will a drunken confession reveal Bobby's real killer?

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: As the McQueens prepare for Bobby's funeral, Mercedes confronts the person who she believes killed her son... Meanwhile, Prince gets some upsetting news. And will a secret fling be exposed?

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: A short, cheeky clip featuring animals and food, from the always hilarious Tube that is Rude.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Lela's: In California, Gordon Ramsay visits Lela's, a fine dining restaurant run by inexperienced owner Lela and young chef Ricky. Can Gordon save them from complete disaster?

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Undercover: Peralta enlists Boyle's help to track down a missing mobster, Holt tests the squad's patience with practice drills, and Gina pleads with Boyle to keep a secret.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Chocolate Milk: Holt's long-time nemesis arrives to carry out an inspection of his precinct. Boyle searches for a plus-one to take to his ex-wife's engagement party.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simpsorama: In a crossover episode, the Simpsons meet the Planet Express crew from Futurama, who've travelled through time to present-day Springfield to stop a catastrophe.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Blazed and Confused: Bart tricks his family into going to a strange desert festival known as Blazing Guy so that he can get revenge on his sadistic new teacher, Mr Lassen.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A High-Pitched Buzz and Training Wheels: Sheldon dismantles the fridge to stop it making an annoying humming noise but must pay for the damage he's done.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Rival Prodigy and Sir Isaac Neutron: When Sheldon's mentor Dr John Sturgis bonds with Paige, another 10-year-old genius, Sheldon is overcome with jealousy.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: A Moving Day: Claire and Phil aren't convinced that Haley and Dylan can make it on their own when they move them into their new apartment before the baby arrives.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Blasts from the Past: Phil and Claire decide to take a cycling tour through Italy before becoming grandparents, and Dylan introduces them to his mum, who has an interesting past.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Cushion Saturation: A game of paintball leads to a squabble when Penny accidentally shoots paint at one of Sheldon's cushions. Romance blossoms between Howard and Leslie.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Terminator Decoupling: Leonard, Sheldon, Howard and Raj discover that beautiful sci-fi actress Summer Glau is on board their train to San Francisco.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Work Song Nanocluster: Penny's home-based business selling hair accessories gets out of hand when an overexcited Sheldon takes charge of production.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Dead Hooker Juxtaposition: Penny develops a rivalry with a sexy female neighbour who moves into the apartment building and threatens to become the 'new Penny'.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Stakeout: Peralta and Boyle go on an eight-day stakeout, putting a strain on their friendship. Holt's nephew visits and makes an instant impression on Diaz.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Beach House: The team are excited about visiting Boyle's beach house for a detectives-only weekend getaway, until Peralta ruins the fun by inviting Captain Holt.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Kids Are All Fight: When Homer finds an old roll of film and has it developed, the family take a trip down memory lane to when Bart and Lisa were always fighting.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Let's Go Fly a Coot: Bart develops a crush on Milhouse's Dutch cousin. And the family learn about Grampa's days in the Air Force.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Einstein Approximation: Sheldon is baffled by a formula he's working on, so he gets a less mentally taxing job at the Cheesecake Factory to kick-start his creativity.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Large Hadron Collision: Sheldon is gutted when Leonard asks Penny to go to Switzerland on Valentine's Day to see the world's largest particle accelerator instead of him.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Excelsior Acquisition: Sheldon is summoned to court for driving through a red light. He misses the chance to meet Stan Lee and riles the judge. Will he go to prison?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Precious Fragmentation: The gang squabble over a ring that they believe was used in The Lord of the Rings movies, and Sheldon seems to be turning into Gollum.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Do Pizza Bots Dream of Electric Guitars: Homer tries to reunite a mechanical band from his youth, but film and TV creator JJ Abrams gets hold of them first.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Manger Things: A secret from Flanders' past is revealed, and we discover a room in the Simpsons' home that we've never seen before.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes says an emotional goodbye to Bobby. Meanwhile, one smug resident watches a heated confrontation unfold. And Prince is in an awkward situation when two villagers ask him out.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Old Man and the Lisa: Mr Burns loses all his money and employs Lisa to help him earn back his fortune. But they don't see eye to eye over ethical issues.

programme.title: New: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: Brand new series - All Work and No Rosé: A primary charter guest gets an unpleasant surprise that threatens to ruin the entire trip. Danni's sent on a difficult mission.

programme.title: New: Celebs Go Dating
programme.desc: Brand new series: Emotions run high as Kerry and Liv put the drama behind them. There's some brutally honest feedback, and Christine makes a difficult decision...

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Medical student Alice dates Max, the self-styled 'Wolf of Wallington High Street'. Veteran house music groover Mark meets Alison, a call centre worker by day and raver by night.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: (2022) Meta-comedy horror 're-quel' with Courteney Cox. Killer Ghostface returns to shock the younger generation out of their love of 'elevated horror' with a bit of old-fashioned slashing.

programme.title: Donkey Punch
programme.desc: (2008) Thriller. A group of British teenagers are partying aboard a luxury yacht in the Med when a sexual encounter ends in manslaughter... and provokes a life-or-death fight for survival.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: (2012) Quirky animated family comedy with the voices of Adam Sandler and Selena Gomez. Count Dracula runs a secluded hotel as a haven for monsters, but his daughter wants to see the world.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: (2007) Supernatural thriller. Alexander Ludwig stars as The Seeker, who has the task of finding six items hidden throughout time, which the scary forces of The Dark are also looking for.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: (2014) Jamie Foxx stars in this reboot of the 1982 musical. Orphan Annie is transported to post-2008 recession-hit New York, where she becomes the ward of a germaphobe running for mayor.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: (1999) Teen comedy with Julia Stiles and Heath Ledger. A student is furious to discover her prom date was bribed by her sister to invite her. But confusion ensues when he falls for her.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: (2017) Hugh Jackman, Zac Efron and Michelle Williams star in the Golden-Globe-winning, toe-tapping smash hit musical about the life and times of P.T. Barnum, the creator of the circus.
(2023) Sci-fi action adventure starring Adam Driver as a spaceman who crash-lands on a strange planet where giant lizards stalk the darkness... 65 million years ago. Where on Earth is he?

programme.title: Brassed Off
programme.desc: (1996) Comedy-drama with Pete Postlethwaite, Ewan McGregor and Tara Fitzgerald. When a Yorkshire mining pit closes down, its band tries to win a music contest to restore community pride.

programme.title: I'm Your Man
programme.desc: (2021) Poignant sci-fi romantic comedy with Maren Eggert and Dan Stevens. In near-future Berlin, a lonely archaeologist helps to trial a new line in robot companions. In German/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Up For It?
programme.desc: George Wilkins meets go-kart enthusiast Xavier. Nadia Nadarajah gives Naomi an acting class. Nadeem and Mia perform, Danny skits, Ricco's visual vernacular and Magic's tricks.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: (2015) Animated family comedy sequel. Mavis (Selena Gomez) and Johnny (Andy Samberg) leave baby Dennis with 'Vampa' Dracula (Adam Sandler), who organises a monster boot camp.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: (1994) Comedy starring Joe Mantegna, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley. Inept criminals kidnap a millionaire's baby. But when the boy escapes, there's mayhem as they try to track him down.

programme.title: Father Goose
programme.desc: (1964) WWII romcom. A beach bum (Cary Grant), who spies on Japan's Pacific naval movements for the US, has his life thrown into chaos by a shipwrecked teacher (Leslie Caron) and her pupils.

programme.title: One Million Years B.C.
programme.desc: (1966) Raquel Welch - in her famous fur bikini - stars in this prehistoric adventure set in an inhospitable landscape populated by two warring tribes and Ray Harryhausen's roving dinosaurs.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: (2004) Sci-fi thriller with Will Smith. In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot. Can he keep an open mind?

programme.title: Wrath of Man
programme.desc: (2021) Jason Statham reunites with director Guy Ritchie to give it both barrels as a mysterious hardman working for a money truck firm that keeps getting hit. But is he an inside man?

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: (2007) Western starring Christian Bale and Russell Crowe. An impoverished rancher tries to earn some money and his family's respect by escorting a dangerous outlaw on his way to jail.

programme.title: Antlers
programme.desc: (2021) Dark, brooding horror with Keri Russell. A teacher tries to help a troubled pupil. She's in for a shock. The boy's bringing home roadkill for something that's locked in his basement.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3
programme.desc: (2018) Spooky animated family comedy. On a monster-friendly cruise, Dracula (Adam Sandler) falls in love - with a vampire slayer!

programme.title: Ferdinand
programme.desc: (2017) Charming animated bovine road movie from the makers of Ice Age. A huge but gentle bull (voiced by John Cena) tries to get home after being sent away to a bull fighting ranch.

programme.title: Sword of Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: (1960) Adventure with Richard Greene, Peter Cushing and a young Oliver Reed. Can Robin Hood foil the villainous Sheriff of Nottingham's evil plan to murder the Archbishop of Canterbury?

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: (1959) Second World War comedy. Tony Curtis and Cary Grant play members of the crew of a submarine that's painted bright pink just as the Japanese launch their assault in the Pacific.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: (1997) Romcom with Julia Roberts and Cameron Diaz. Is it okay for a girl to wreck a wedding because she only realises she loves a guy when he tells her he's getting married to someone else?

programme.title: American Gangster Special
programme.desc: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe and director Ridley Scott talk about making American Gangster, the 2007 crime epic based on an unlikely true story.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: (2007) True crime thriller directed by Ridley Scott. An outcast New York cop (Russell Crowe) is charged with bringing down entrepreneurial Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas (Denzel Washington).

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: (2021) Action thriller with Bob Odenkirk. He's just a dad who goes to work and takes out the trash. But really he's an ex-assassin about to unleash his true self... and take out the trash.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: (2022) Meta-comedy horror 're-quel' with Courteney Cox. Killer Ghostface returns to shock the younger generation out of their love of 'elevated horror' with a bit of old-fashioned slashing.

programme.title: Donkey Punch
programme.desc: (2008) Thriller. A group of British teenagers are partying aboard a luxury yacht in the Med when a sexual encounter ends in manslaughter... and provokes a life-or-death fight for survival.

programme.title: Sword of Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: (1960) Adventure with Richard Greene, Peter Cushing and a young Oliver Reed. Can Robin Hood foil the villainous Sheriff of Nottingham's evil plan to murder the Archbishop of Canterbury?

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: (1959) Second World War comedy. Tony Curtis and Cary Grant play members of the crew of a submarine that's painted bright pink just as the Japanese launch their assault in the Pacific.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: (1997) Romcom with Julia Roberts and Cameron Diaz. Is it okay for a girl to wreck a wedding because she only realises she loves a guy when he tells her he's getting married to someone else?

programme.desc: (2007) True crime thriller directed by Ridley Scott. An outcast New York cop (Russell Crowe) is charged with bringing down entrepreneurial Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas (Denzel Washington).

programme.title: The Twelve
programme.desc: Kate Lawson's provocative artwork takes centre stage in the courtroom. Bloom focuses on its preoccupation with mortality and suggests Kate orchestrated Claire's death for her final work. A complicated mental health diagnosis is revealed, which is particularly pertinent for Vanessa

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
programme.desc: The celebrity team come to the end of their fast-track training to dive with 18-foot tiger sharks and relocate to the world-famous dive site of Tiger Beach - after getting one last chance to hone their skills and demonstrate that they are ready to take part, the qualified team members come face to face with the iconic shark. Will the celebrities have their perceptions changed in a life-changing encounter, are they still monsters to be scared of, or is their biggest fear an ocean without sharks?

programme.title: Ainsley's Good Mood Food
programme.desc: Ainsley Harriott prepares dishes involving dairy products, including a Greek lamb burger topped with feta and mint, and a sweet pizza topped with apricots and blueberries, served with a delicious amaretto cream. Joseph Denison Carey gets a lesson in cheese-making

programme.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
programme.desc: James is joined in the kitchen by Charley Boorman from Long Way Home while also enjoying a feast of delicious recipes from chefs Asma Khan, Ronnie Murray, and Mike Reid.

programme.title: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
programme.desc: Katie is joined by actress Hayley Tamaddon for a space hopper race, hairdresser Michael Douglas and make-up artist Genevieve Turley transform another charity advocate, and Aldo Zilli serves up delicious drinks

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan this time are actress and West End star Janie Dee, Betty Spencer herself - actress Michele Dotrice - and Tom Surgey with some summer spritzers.

programme.title: Ainsley's Fantastic Flavours
programme.desc: Chef Ainsley Harriott demonstrates recipes for Mexican food, beginning with carne asada tacos with chargrilled spring onions and a chiltomate salsa. Ruby Bhogal provides a masterclass in chillies, tries a birria taco, and knocks up an elote-topped salad, while Jayne Middlemiss serves up cheesy bean and corn quesadillas with guacamole, before Ainsley completes the show with a hearty stew of pork pozole

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Ninja Warrior UK
programme.desc: Ben Shephard, Rochelle Humes and Chris Kamara host the grand final of the obstacle course challenge, with the final five competitors from across the nation testing their strength, speed and courage. Those who make it to the end of the adrenaline-fuelled mission face one final task - scaling the heights of a tower named Mount Midoriyama - as they battle it out for the title of Ninja Warrior UK

programme.title: Catchphrase: Catchiest Moments
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern presents a compilation of some of his favourite moments from the quiz show, from the funniest answers to the strangest. Featuring previously unseen footage, and giving viewers a chance to play along at home as contestants make unexpected attempts to Say What They See

programme.title: Octopussy
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Roger Moore, Maud Adams and Louis Jourdan. A British agent killed in East Germany is found dressed as a clown, clutching a priceless Fabergé egg. James Bond sets out to solve the mystery and finds himself pitted against Octopussy, a rich businesswoman with her own private army and an interest in priceless antiques.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Martin from Leeds, Dylan from Aberdare, Sonia from Merseyside and Karen from Exmouth pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Cooking with the Stars
programme.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen host as Natalie Cassidy, Jack Osbourne, Jordan North, Shaun Wright-Phillips, Hugh Dennis and Kelly Hoppen take on one another in the show's first-ever six-way cooking battle. The contestants have to deliver a British classic using only air fryers in just 30 minutes, with the bottom two having to cook more speedy dishes in a bid to secure a place in the quarter-final

programme.title: Ridley
programme.desc: The discovery of a decomposed body in the depths of Hawsley Wood sends shockwaves through the investigative team as it is identified as a woman who vanished six years previously. Ridley joins forces with Carol and Goodwin to delve into the circumstances surrounding the case and is forced to enlist the help of a disgraced ex-copper who oversaw the original investigation

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Sci-fi action adventure starring James Franco and Freida Pinto. When scientist Will Rodman's programme of drug experiments to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease is shut down he secretly takes an offspring from one of the chimpanzees he was using into his home and names him Caesar. Caesar has inherited the effects of the trial drug and begins to show remarkable intelligence, a development that will put him on a violent collision course with the humans who have abused him.

programme.title: Motorsport UK
programme.desc: Richard John Neil presents action from Oulton Park featuring racing from the Wera Tools F4 British Championship and the Porsche Sprint Challenge Great Britain.

programme.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts another charity edition of the game show, with Mel Blatt, Michelle Visage and Seann Walsh trying to say what they see as they guess well-known phrases for the chance to win a £50,000 jackpot for their chosen good causes

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Father and son Thomas and Neil, Welsh couple Michalina and Phil, and sisters Titi and Tolu from London work out words that appear in the Lingo grids and Puzzlewords. The last remaining duo have the opportunity to win the money they've banked earlier in the show to potentially double their winnings, or leave with nothing. Adil Ray hosts

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Paul from Norfolk, Roisin from Gateshead, Zoe from Buckinghamshire and Albert from Manchester pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: STV News at Six and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Robert comforts Aaron in his depths of despair and the pair give in to temptation, while Dylan puts on a brave face to April after another knock back in his job search. Cain is left worried when DC Cole wants to talk about the investigation into Nate's murder

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Kit inadvertently jeopardises Sarah's important client meeting, Tyrone catches Steve and Cassie frolicking, Carl finds Tracy waiting in his hotel room, Debbie admonishes Ronnie for interfering in her work, and Dee-Dee worries about a conflict of interest

programme.title: Matthew Perry: A Hollywood Tragedy
programme.desc: Friends star Perry's sudden death in October 2023 shocked the world. A known addict, he was found to have ketamine in his system and months later five individuals were charged with illegally supplying him the drug. This documentary explores Perry's rise to fame and his tragic final days with insights from castmates, friends, law enforcement and Perry's own candid accounts

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs programme delving into stories beyond the headlines. Featuring live studio debates and comprehensive analysis, it sheds light on key stories impacting the nation and its surroundings

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present the stories of two men hoping to find birth family. Joe McGregor was adopted as a baby in Bermuda in the 1970s and grew up in Norfolk in a loving family, yet he still yearns to find his birth family. Simon Miller's mum's dying wish was that he should find the daughter who she gave up for adoption just a few years before he was born

programme.title: Cooking with the Stars
programme.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen present the celebrity cookery contest in which famous faces are mentored by world-class chefs to compete in culinary battles. In the first edition, actress Natalie Cassidy goes head to head with radio presenter Jordan North, and reality stars Jack Osbourne and Jessica Wright go up against each other, attempting to deliver gourmet dishes on a budget of just three pounds per portion. Who will go straight through and which two stars will face each other in the cook-off? Others taking part throughout the series are Hugh Dennis, Ekin-Su Cülcüloglu, Kelly Hoppen and Shaun Wright-Phillips

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Jimmy's Taste of Florida
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty embarks on a culinary tour of the Sunshine State, starting in Pensacola, where he explores the city's food scene with chef Blake and uncovers the Southern delicacy of boiled peanuts. Continuing to Panama City Beach, Jimmy meets champion oyster shucker Honor Allen and finds himself in an unwinnable contest, before moving on to a family-run shop to try his hand at doughnut making

programme.desc: Gated estate Challis Court is a tight-knit community for retired police officers, but when a new arrival is found dead, the other residents regard the murder as both an affront and a challenge. programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
programme.desc: Another line-up of contestants answer questions that could change their lives - with the four lifelines Ask the Audience, Phone a Friend, 50-50 and Ask the Host available to them if they get stuck. Jeremy Clarkson hosts

programme.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
programme.desc: The celebrity team come to the end of their fast-track training to dive with 18-foot tiger sharks and relocate to the world-famous dive site of Tiger Beach - after getting one last chance to hone their skills and demonstrate that they are ready to take part, the qualified team members come face to face with the iconic shark. Will the celebrities have their perceptions changed in a life-changing encounter, are they still monsters to be scared of, or is their biggest fear an ocean without sharks?

programme.title: Ainsley's Good Mood Food
programme.desc: Ainsley Harriott prepares dishes involving dairy products, including a Greek lamb burger topped with feta and mint, and a sweet pizza topped with apricots and blueberries, served with a delicious amaretto cream. Joseph Denison Carey gets a lesson in cheese-making

programme.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
programme.desc: James is joined in the kitchen by Charley Boorman from Long Way Home while also enjoying a feast of delicious recipes from chefs Asma Khan, Ronnie Murray, and Mike Reid.

programme.title: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
programme.desc: Katie is joined by actress Hayley Tamaddon for a space hopper race, hairdresser Michael Douglas and make-up artist Genevieve Turley transform another charity advocate, and Aldo Zilli serves up delicious drinks

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan this time are actress and West End star Janie Dee, Betty Spencer herself - actress Michele Dotrice - and Tom Surgey with some summer spritzers.

programme.title: Ainsley's Fantastic Flavours
programme.desc: Chef Ainsley Harriott demonstrates recipes for Mexican food, beginning with carne asada tacos with chargrilled spring onions and a chiltomate salsa. Ruby Bhogal provides a masterclass in chillies, tries a birria taco, and knocks up an elote-topped salad, while Jayne Middlemiss serves up cheesy bean and corn quesadillas with guacamole, before Ainsley completes the show with a hearty stew of pork pozole

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Ninja Warrior UK
programme.desc: Ben Shephard, Rochelle Humes and Chris Kamara host the grand final of the obstacle course challenge, with the final five competitors from across the nation testing their strength, speed and courage. Those who make it to the end of the adrenaline-fuelled mission face one final task - scaling the heights of a tower named Mount Midoriyama - as they battle it out for the title of Ninja Warrior UK

programme.title: Catchphrase: Catchiest Moments
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern presents a compilation of some of his favourite moments from the quiz show, from the funniest answers to the strangest. Featuring previously unseen footage, and giving viewers a chance to play along at home as contestants make unexpected attempts to Say What They See

programme.title: Octopussy
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Roger Moore, Maud Adams and Louis Jourdan. A British agent killed in East Germany is found dressed as a clown, clutching a priceless Fabergé egg. James Bond sets out to solve the mystery and finds himself pitted against Octopussy, a rich businesswoman with her own private army and an interest in priceless antiques.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Martin from Leeds, Dylan from Aberdare, Sonia from Merseyside and Karen from Exmouth pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Cooking with the Stars
programme.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen host as Natalie Cassidy, Jack Osbourne, Jordan North, Shaun Wright-Phillips, Hugh Dennis and Kelly Hoppen take on one another in the show's first-ever six-way cooking battle. The contestants have to deliver a British classic using only air fryers in just 30 minutes, with the bottom two having to cook more speedy dishes in a bid to secure a place in the quarter-final

programme.title: Ridley
programme.desc: The discovery of a decomposed body in the depths of Hawsley Wood sends shockwaves through the investigative team as it is identified as a woman who vanished six years previously. Ridley joins forces with Carol and Goodwin to delve into the circumstances surrounding the case and is forced to enlist the help of a disgraced ex-copper who oversaw the original investigation

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Sci-fi action adventure starring James Franco and Freida Pinto. When scientist Will Rodman's programme of drug experiments to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease is shut down he secretly takes an offspring from one of the chimpanzees he was using into his home and names him Caesar. Caesar has inherited the effects of the trial drug and begins to show remarkable intelligence, a development that will put him on a violent collision course with the humans who have abused him.

programme.title: Motorsport UK
programme.desc: Richard John Neil presents action from Oulton Park featuring racing from the Wera Tools F4 British Championship and the Porsche Sprint Challenge Great Britain.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Robert comforts Aaron in his depths of despair and the pair give in to temptation, while Dylan puts on a brave face to April after another knock back in his job search. Cain is left worried when DC Cole wants to talk about the investigation into Nate's murder

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Kit inadvertently jeopardises Sarah's important client meeting, Tyrone catches Steve and Cassie frolicking, Carl finds Tracy waiting in his hotel room, Debbie admonishes Ronnie for interfering in her work, and Dee-Dee worries about a conflict of interest

programme.title: Matthew Perry: A Hollywood Tragedy
programme.desc: Friends star Perry's sudden death in October 2023 shocked the world. A known addict, he was found to have ketamine in his system and months later five individuals were charged with illegally supplying him the drug. This documentary explores Perry's rise to fame and his tragic final days with insights from castmates, friends, law enforcement and Perry's own candid accounts

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs programme delving into stories beyond the headlines. Featuring live studio debates and comprehensive analysis, it sheds light on key stories impacting the nation and its surroundings

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present the stories of two men hoping to find birth family. Joe McGregor was adopted as a baby in Bermuda in the 1970s and grew up in Norfolk in a loving family, yet he still yearns to find his birth family. Simon Miller's mum's dying wish was that he should find the daughter who she gave up for adoption just a few years before he was born

programme.title: Cooking with the Stars
programme.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen present the celebrity cookery contest in which famous faces are mentored by world-class chefs to compete in culinary battles. In the first edition, actress Natalie Cassidy goes head to head with radio presenter Jordan North, and reality stars Jack Osbourne and Jessica Wright go up against each other, attempting to deliver gourmet dishes on a budget of just three pounds per portion. Who will go straight through and which two stars will face each other in the cook-off? Others taking part throughout the series are Hugh Dennis, Ekin-Su Cülcüloglu, Kelly Hoppen and Shaun Wright-Phillips

programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty embarks on a culinary tour of the Sunshine State, starting in Pensacola, where he explores the city's food scene with chef Blake and uncovers the Southern delicacy of boiled peanuts. Continuing to Panama City Beach, Jimmy meets champion oyster shucker Honor Allen and finds himself in an unwinnable contest, before moving on to a family-run shop to try his hand at doughnut making

Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Judith from Glasgow, Sam from London, Lee from Lincoln and Pam from Liverpool pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: STV News at Six and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Aaron is fighting his guilt and decides the night before was just a one-off, Mack is unable to hide feeling hurt that Charity hasn't contacted him after kicking him out. Gabby continues to try to persuade Vinny to report Kammy to the police

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Gated estate Challis Court is a tight-knit community for retired police officers, but when a new arrival is found dead, the other residents regard the murder as both an affront and a challenge. Barnaby investigates and realises that the killer is likely to be an ex-police officer too. Crime drama, starring Neil Dudgeon, with Tom Conti

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs programme delving into stories beyond the headlines. Featuring live studio debates and comprehensive analysis, it sheds light on key stories impacting the nation and its surroundings

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
programme.desc: Another line-up of contestants answer questions that could change their lives - with the four lifelines Ask the Audience, Phone a Friend, 50-50 and Ask the Host available to them if they get stuck. Jeremy Clarkson hosts
